channel.title: Detailed analytics for Mailgun transactional emails
channel.description:
I am designing a tool for better analytics for transactional emails I send through Mailgun. I wanted a more detailed email performance dashboard, know who opened and clicked on what, and the email interacted with. It is available at [suet.co](https://suet.co/)
I will appreciate feedback.
Thanks.
